name: Remixed White Jeans
description:
These are a size 5 Long super low rise jean that have been remixed. The back & front pocket, as well as the left upper thigh and right knee have been shredded. There is little to no stretch to this material.

Waist: 16"
Inseam: 32"
Rise: 7"

name: Splattered!
description:
♥´¨)
¸.•´¸.•*´¨) ¸.•*¨)
(¸.•´ (¸.•` ♥You will receive one pair of hand crafted fabric button stud earrings inside a lovely organza bag. Fabric used in these button earrings is hand selected and hand cut. Since each pair is handmade no two will be exactly a like. These earrings will be a great addition to anyone's jewelry collection!

¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨¨¨

DETAILS:

*Size: 1 1/8" (2.85 cm) aluminum button
*Hypo allergenic post & butterfly backing
*Fabric: 100% cotton

¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨¨¨

CARE:

*A water proof adhesive was used in the production, but the earrings weren't designed to withstand swimming or showering.
*If dirtied, gently spot clean and allow to air dry.

SHIPPING is always FREE for earring purchases!

name: Limited Edition Shimmering* Body Butter
description:
♥´¨) 
¸.•´¸.•*´¨) ¸.•*¨) 
(¸.•´ (¸.•` ♥Just in time for the summer! Naturally moisturize, and condition your skin with whipped shea coconut butter. Shea butter helps with dry skin and eczema, softens wrinkles, protects against UV rays, repairs and promotes healthy skin. Coconut oil is a natural antimicrobial and is close to the oil your skin naturally produces. This allows for it to be easily absorbed. This shimmering* hand whipped shea coconut butter is made with unrefined shea butter, and certified organic virgin coconut oil. The whipped butter is scented, conditioned, and preserved naturally with organic essential oils. The scent is a very calming and slightly earthly one. There are hints of cedar, lemon and violet. You will receive one (2 oz.) recylable metal tin filled with amazing hand whipped shea butter. Please reuse, re-gift, or recycle!

*This butter is enhanced with micro iridescent body glitter

name: Whipped Shea Coconut Hair & Body Butter
description:
♥´¨)
¸.•´¸.•*´¨) ¸.•*¨)
(¸.•´ (¸.•` ♥Naturally moisturize, and condition your skin with whipped shea coconut butter. Shea butter helps with dry skin and eczema, softens wrinkles, protects against UV rays, repairs and promotes healthy skin. Coconut oil is a natural antimicrobial and is close to the oil your skin naturally produces. This allows for it to be easily absorbed. This hand whipped shea coconut butter is made with unrefined shea butter, and certified organic virgin coconut oil. The whipped butter is scented, conditioned, and preserved naturally with organic essential oils. You will receive one (4 oz.) plastic jar filled with amazing hand whipped shea butter. Please reuse, re-gift, or recycle!


¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨¨¨

USES: 

*Apply directly to skin after a bath/shower to lock in moisture and condition your skin. 
*Rub into the scalp to help condition dry, itchy, or chapped skin and to give your hair a healthy shine.
*It can be used daily from head to toe. The whipped butter melts with body temperature, and a little goes a long way. 


¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨¨¨

INGREDIENTS [all natural]: 

Unrefined shea butter (not chemically processed), certified organic virgin coconut oil, Vitamin E oil, grapeseed oil, sweet almond oil, organic essential oils, LOVE

¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨¨¨

Product becomes liquid at 75 degrees, but this does not negatively affect it. To solidify just place the jar in the refrigerator.

Since each order is hand crafted please allow for slight variances. 

¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨¨¨

NEW OPTIONS:

*Shimmerize It! by having a little sparkle added to your whipped butter.

*Cool, calm & scent-it! by having relaxing essential oils added to your whipped butter.


¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨¨¨



*****ALLERGY ALERT***** Shea Butter & Coconut Oil is not recommended for people with a nut or latex allergy




If you're interested in learning more about Shea Butter, check out my blog post here: 

http://naturallymzdezy.wordpress.com/2011/10/19/shea-butter/
